import { Avatar } from '@material-ui/core'; import LocationOnIcon from '@material-ui/icons/LocationOn'; import React from 'react'; import "./CampaignBox.css"; function CampaignBox({profilePic, username, timestamp, title, target, location, description, image}) { return (

{username}

{timestamp}

{location}

{title}

${target}

{description}

) } export default CampaignBox
